preconditions.precondition: A Security Profile has been created and disabled.

mainSequence.step: Security Engineer enables the Security Profile.
Create security profile named secProfileESP with file ./templates/secprofile.yml.
Notify EventBus about security profile creation.
Notify EventBus about security profile disablement.
Notify EventBus about security profile enablement.
All attached identities in the system re-evaluate their policies.
